entries: The <name> has a +<mod_pb> bonus to its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} rolls.

Additionally, when the <name> rolls initiative, it can choose a willing creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature's initiative changes to go immediately after the <name> (this does not grant an additional turn if the target has already taken a turn this round).
The <name> makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Bark Orders.
{@atkr mw} <hit_default>, reach 10 ft., one target <dmg_medium> bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage.
{@atkr mw} <hit_default>, reach 5 ft., one target <dmg_puny> piercing damage.

A creature the <name> can see within 30 feet, and that can see or hear the <name>, can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to either move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks or make a weapon attack.

A creature the <name> can see within 30 feet, and that can see or hear the <name>, can use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to either move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks or make a weapon attack. On a hit, the attack deals an additional <dmg_4s3_d6s> damage.

The <name> takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Help|XPHB} action. If it takes the Help action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, that target can be up to 30 feet away from the <name>.
